sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,MER_AMT ,FEE_AMT ,ACCOUNT_TYPE ,STATUS ,SETTLE_DATE ,CREATE_TIME ,UPDATE_TIME ,UPDATE_OPER_ID ,CHANGE_STATUS ,CHANGE_AMT ,CHANGE_OPER_ID ,CHANGE_REASON ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 FROM ACCOUNT_MANAGE WHERE 1=1 AND ACCOUNT_MANAGE.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MER_AMT) Like '%'||(#mer_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FEE_AMT) Like '%'||(#fee_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#account_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPDATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#update_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPDATE_OPER_ID) Like '%'||(#update_oper_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_STATUS) Like '%'||(#change_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_AMT) Like '%'||(#change_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_OPER_ID) Like '%'||(#change_oper_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_REASON) Like '%'||(#change_reason:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM ACCOUNT_MANAGE WHERE 1=1 AND ACCOUNT_MANAGE.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MER_AMT) Like '%'||(#mer_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FEE_AMT) Like '%'||(#fee_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#account_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPDATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#update_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPDATE_OPER_ID) Like '%'||(#update_oper_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_STATUS) Like '%'||(#change_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_AMT) Like '%'||(#change_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_OPER_ID) Like '%'||(#change_oper_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_REASON) Like '%'||(#change_reason:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
